verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the teaching <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G746><s%> the first principles <S%G746><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> let us press on <S%G5342><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> perfection <S%G5047><s%> â€” not <S%G3361><s%> laying <S%G2598><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> a foundation <S%G2310><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> from <S%G575><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

of the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of baptisms, <S%G909><s%> of <S%G5037><s%> laying on <S%G1936><s%> of hands, <S%G5495><s%> of resurrection <S%G386><s%> of <S%G2917><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of <S%G2917><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> judgment. <S%G2917><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> will we do, <S%G4160><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> permits. <S%G2010><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> concerning those who were <S%G5461><s%> once <S%G530><s%> enlightened <S%G5461><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> tasted <S%G1089><s%> of the <S%G1431><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> gift, <S%G1431><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> tasted <S%G1089><s%> the <S%G4487><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the age <S%G165><s%> to come, <S%G3195><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> then fell away, <S%G3895><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> renew them <S%G340><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance; <S%G3341><s%> seeing they crucify <S%G388><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for themselves <S%G1438><s%> again, <S%G2532><s%> and put him to open shame. <S%G3856><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has drunk <S%G4095><s%> the rain <S%G5205><s%> that comes <S%G2064><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brings forth <S%G5088><s%> a <S%G2532><s%> crop suitable <S%G2111><s%> for them <S%G1565><s%> <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> sake it is also tilled, <S%G1090><s%> receives <S%G3335><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> if it bears <S%G1627><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thistles, <S%G5146><s%> it is rejected <S%G96><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> being cursed, <S%G2671><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is to <S%G1519><s%> be burned. <S%G2740><s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> we are persuaded <S%G3982><s%> of better things <S%G2909><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things that accompany <S%G2192><s%> salvation, <S%G1487><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> though we <S%G2980><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> like this. <S%G3779><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> unrighteous, <S%G94><s%> so as to forget <S%G1950><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the labor <S%G2873><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you showed <S%G1731><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> in that you served <S%G1247><s%> the saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> still do serve them. <S%G1247><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> We desire that <S%G1937><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> may show <S%G1731><s%> the <S%G4710><s%> same <S%G846><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the fullness <S%G4136><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> even to <S%G891><s%> the end, <S%G5056><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> you won't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> sluggish, <S%G3576><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of those who <S%G2816><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> inherited <S%G2816><s%> the promises. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G1861><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made a promise <S%G1861><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> since <S%G1893><s%> he could <S%G2192><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> greater, <S%G3173><s%> he swore <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%>

saying, <S%G2229><s%> "Surely <S%G3375><s%> blessing <S%G2127><s%> I will bless <S%G2127><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> multiplying <S%G4129><s%> I will multiply <S%G4129><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> Thus, <S%G3779><s%> having patiently endured, <S%G3114><s%> he obtained <S%G2013><s%> the promise. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> men <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> a greater <S%G3187><s%> one, <S%G2532><s%> and in every <S%G3956><s%> dispute <S%G485><s%> of theirs <S%G846><s%> the oath <S%G3727><s%> is final <S%G4009><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> confirmation. <S%G951><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> this way God, <S%G2316><s%> being determined <S%G1014><s%> to show <S%G1925><s%> more abundantly <S%G4054><s%> to the heirs <S%G2818><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> the immutability <S%G276><s%> of <S%G1012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> counsel, <S%G1012><s%> interposed <S%G3315><s%> with an oath; <S%G3727><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> immutable <S%G276><s%> things, <S%G4229><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> to lie, <S%G5574><s%> we may have <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G3874><s%> strong <S%G2478><s%> encouragement, <S%G3874><s%> who have fled for refuge <S%G2703><s%> to take hold <S%G2902><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> set before us. <S%G4295><s%>

This <S%G3739><s%> hope we have <S%G2192><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an anchor <S%G45><s%> of the soul, <S%G5590><s%> a hope both <S%G5037><s%> sure <S%G804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> steadfast <S%G949><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that which is within <S%G2082><s%> the veil; <S%G2665><s%>

where <S%G3699><s%> as <S%G1525><s%> a forerunner <S%G4274><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> having become <S%G1096><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>
